data.title: Aaron Ramsey News, Stats and Updates
data.meta_description: Find out the latest news on Nice and Wales midfielder Aaron Ramsey, including goals, stats and injury updates right here.
data.text:
Wales captain Aaron Ramsey named in Rob Page's Euro 2024 play-off squad, despite failing to start a match for SIX MONTHS due to a knee injury

The 84-times capped Wales skipper suffered a knee injury in September and was out until February, making two substitute appearances for Cardiff before picking up a calf complaint.

Aston Villa may sell at LEAST one key player this summer after losing almost £120MILLION in the last accounting year.... with futures of Douglas Luiz, Lucas Digne, and Jacob Ramsey unclear

The Premier League's profit and sustainability rules (PSR) state that clubs can lose no more than £105m over a three-year period, with points deductions among the possible penalties.

Aston Villa are braced for interest in their star players this summer... with £50m-rated Jacob Ramsey wanted by Newcastle in January and Arsenal long-term suitors of Douglas Luiz

Aston Villa are braced for interest in their star players this summer as the impact of spending rules bites across the league.

Burnley 0-5 Arsenal: Bukayo Saka scores twice as rampant Gunners run riot at Turf Moor to ensure his side move to within just two points of Premier League leaders Liverpool as Mikel Arteta's men make club history

JOE BERNSTEIN AT TURF MOOR: Arsenal have won their first five league matches of 2024 - the first time they've achieved that in any calendar year - and have scored 21 goals.

Micah Richards jokes he was 'on absolute FIRE' during parties at sex-mad Olympic village in 2012 as he recalls staying out until 4am while playing for Team GB's football side

The former Manchester City defender was one of 18 players selected by Stuart Pearce for the Team GB squad 12 years ago - which also included Ryan Giggs, Daniel Sturridge and Craig Bellamy.

Jay Boothroyd calls out Dermot Gallagher for his refusal to give his view on several contentious penalty calls... as he tells the former referee his New Year's resolution should be 'answering questions'

Gallagher, 66, officiated in the top flight from 1992 to 2007 and now works as as a refereeing expert for Sky Sports, giving his opinion on many decisions.

Aston Villa 3-2 Burnley: Douglas Luiz scores 89th minute penalty to secure Unai Emery's title-chasing hosts all three points after Burnley twice battled back to level the scores

TOM COLLOMOSSE AT VILLA PARK: Trafford guessed right but could not reach the ball as it kissed the underside of the bar, bounced down over the line and back up again into the net.

Sir Jim Ratcliffe FINALLY gets his foot through the door of English football... so, after going from growing up in a council house to a £16.8billion fortune, can he be the man to turn Man United around?

Sir Jim Ratcliffe has rarely had things easy, spending the first 10 years of his life in a council house on Dunkerley Avenue in Failsworth, a small town between Manchester and Oldham.

Man United-bound Sir Jim Ratcliffe's INEOS group owns a Ligue 1 club, has invested in Formula One, rugby and cycling and is now set to shake things up at Old Trafford - but how has the £16.5bn man built his empire?

Sir Jim Ratcliffe is close to finally completing his purchase of a minority stake in Manchester United, bringing the year-long uncertainty over the club's ownership to an end.

Wales 2-1 Croatia: Harry Wilson scores twice on his 50th appearance to boost hosts' Euro 2024 qualification hopes and ease pressure on boss Rob Page despite Mario Pasalic's late strike

TOM COLLOMOSSE AT THE CARDIFF CITY STADIUM: Rob Page appeared to fight back tears after putting Wales on course for a third major tournament in succession.

Liverpool starlet Jarell Quansah gets reward for impressive performances in Jurgen Klopp's side with his first call-up to the England U21 squad - as Newcastle's Tino Livramento and Burnley attacker Aaron Ramsey receive recalls

The defender is in line to make his debut for Lee Carsley's European champions alongside on-loan Hull City midfielder Jaden Philogene and Norwich City winger Jonathan Rowe.

Robbie Savage's son and former Man United starlet Charlie receives his first Wales call-up as Wrexham star Paul Mullen is put on standby for upcoming clashes with Gibraltar and Croatia

Savage has been in good form at the start of the 2023-24 campaign for Reading, with a goal and an assist in his 10 League One starts, although the Royals are languishing in 22nd place.

Newcastle 2-0 Burnley: Eddie Howe's side continue bright form ahead of Champions League showdown with PSG thanks to Miguel Almiron and Alexander Isak goals

CRAIG HOPE AT ST JAMES' PARK: Newcastle had to exert more energy than he would have liked with PSG to come, and those Castore kits certainly weighed heavy come full-time.

WONDERS OF THE PYRAMID: The numbers show why rock-bottom Middlesbrough must not rush to axe Michael Carrick despite their poor start to the season

LEWIS STEELE: Huddersfield confirmed their replacement last night for Neil Warnock - who said he was 'gobsmacked and a bit hurt' by his exit - with Darren Moore taking over.

EFL ROUND UP: Swansea boss Michael Duff is still waiting for lift-off, Preston go top of the Championship, while Exeter knock Stevenage off the summit in League One

Swansea manager Michael Duff is still searching for his first Championship victory after Cardiff ended a run of four south Wales derby reverses with a 2-0 success.

DAN BIGGAR: Wales' Rugby World Cup gets off to the perfect start, taking local recommendations from Aaron Ramsey... and choosing my wife over Prince William!

DAN BIGGAR'S WORLD CUP DIARY: From meeting Prince William and getting texts from Siya Kolisi to picking Aaron Ramsey's brains, it's been a busy week in the Nice sunshine.

Cardiff 2-0 Swansea: Second-half goals from Ollie Tanner and Aaron Ramsey see hosts secure bragging rights in electrifying South Wales derby

Cardiff ended their South Wales derby losing streak with a 2-0 Sky Bet Championship win over Swansea.

EXCLUSIVE: Aaron Ramsey reveals ambition to follow in the footsteps of Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta and become a manager... but first he is targeting a return to the big time with boyhood club Cardiff

Fifteen years after leaving south Wales for Arsenal, Ramsey is back where it all began. When he departed French club Nice in the summer, Ramsey had several offers.

Gareth Bale responds to Aaron Ramsey's Tottenham dig as former Spurs star praises Brennan Johnson for choosing the club because they are 'better than Arsenal'

Former Tottenham winger Gareth Bale has responded to Aaron Ramsey 's dig at the club over the signing of Brennan Johnson this summer.

Latvia 0-2 Wales: Aaron Ramsey's first half penalty and David Brooks' late strike hands the visitors victory as Rob Page's European Championship qualification hopes are given a boost

Aaron Ramsey's first half penalty sent Wales on their way to victory against Latvia before Bournemouth winger David Brooks added a second in stoppage time on Monday evening.

Burnley sign Aaron Ramsey for £14m from Aston Villa with the England U20 midfielder - brother of Jacob - becoming Vincent Kompany’s 11th summer signing

SIMON JONES: Burnley have confirmed the signing of Aaron Ramsey from Aston Villa for £14m, with the midfielder becoming the Clarets 11th signing of the summer transfer window.

Leicester 2-1 Cardiff: Foxes new signing Cesare Casadei marks debut with injury-time winner to secure four wins under new boss Enzo Maresca

Cesare Casadei marked his Leicester debut with a stoppage-time winner after Aaron Ramsey had threatened to derail the Foxes' 100% start to the season.

Burnley are close to finalising £14m deal for Aston Villa youngster Aaron Ramsey, as they turn attention away from free agent Andros Townsend

SIMON JONES: The Clarets have already made a number of signings this summer ahead of their return campaign in the Premier League and are looking to make Ramsey their next recruit.

Aaron Ramsey completes sensational return to boyhood club Cardiff City after rejecting Saudi clubs mega money... as son Sonny joins the Bluebirds academy

Welsh captain Aaron Ramsey has signed to his former club, Cardiff City on a two-year deal after French side Nice confirm his departure from the Ligue 1 side.

Aaron Ramsey is set for fairytale return to Cardiff - 15 years after leaving for Arsenal at just 17 - as Wales captain nears two-year deal with hometown club

Ramsey was keen to return to south Wales for family reasons and Cardiff was always his first choice, after interest from the Saudi Pro League never developed into an offer.

Aaron Ramsey 'to turn down money-spinning Saudi deal to sign for boyhood side Cardiff', 15 years after leaving the Bluebirds for Arsenal

Aaron Ramsey is reportedly set to turn down a huge financial contract in Saudi Arabia to return to his boyhood club Cardiff City.

Aaron Ramsey is 'in talks over a sensational return to boyhood side Cardiff' - 15 years after leaving for Arsenal - as the Welsh captain looks for a new club after being released by Nice

The 32-year-old is also thought to have rejected the advances of clubs from Turkey, and is now in discussions over a move to Erol Bulu's side this summer, according to reports.

ALVISE CAGNAZZO: Paul Pogba is having a worse impact at Juventus than Aaron Ramsey... he must turn things around next season to save his career for club and country

Paul Pogba will head into the new season knowing time is running out for him to prove his worth at Juventus while trying to maintain appeal at international level.

A team-mate of Cristiano Ronaldo in Saudi Arabia, the midfielder who nearly lost his foot and a sub now running a biochemistry company... where are the stars of Arsenal's last win at Man City?

Arsenal's fate is still just about in their own hands, but they are set to face arguably the biggest test in world football - playing Pep Guardiola's Manchester City away from home.

'I think we've played better in other games': Middlesbrough boss Michael Carrick thinks they were not great despite scoring FIVE against Norwich... as Canaries boss David Wagner rues 'horrendous mistakes'

Michael Carrick felt his Middlesbrough side were not at their best despite hitting Norwich for five at the Riverside.

Middlesbrough 5-1 Norwich: Michael Carrick's ruthless side hammer their promotion rivals - scoring four in a sublime first half - to go third in the Championship

ADAM SHERGOLD AT THE RIVERSIDE STADIUM: Archer netted twice, with Ramsey, Hackney and Akpom also on target as Norwich's own top six ambitions took a hefty whack.

Aaron Ramsey expresses hope that Mikel Arteta can guide Arsenal to the Premier League title and insists he knew his former team-mate 'was always going to be a manager'

Ramsey played alongside Arteta for five years in the Arsenal midfield and the Spaniard was the Welshman's captain for two of those.

Gareth Bale will receive a pitchside presentation and farewell from Wales fans ahead of Tuesday night's Euro 2024 qualifying clash with Latvia after his retirement earlier this year following incredible 16-year international career

Former captain Bale retired from football in January after making 111 appearances and scoring 41 goals - both records for the team - during a remarkable 16-year international career.

Aaron Ramsey was encouraged to continue playing by Dave Brailsford - who is part of the set-up at Nice - with the ex-British Cycling boss playing a crucial role in ensuring the Wales captain committed his future to football

TOM COLLOMOSSE: Dave Brailsford is known better for his work in cycling than football yet he played an important role in ensuring Aaron Ramsey felt ready to captain Wales again.

'Football is forever changing, but we're excited for the future': Former Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey was going to RETIRE after Wales' early World Cup exit... but was inspired to continue under new management at Ligue 1 Nice

INTERVIEW BY TOM COLLOMOSSE: Aaron Ramsey was poised to quit football after the World Cup before a change of coach at his club Nice persuaded him to change his mind.

Wales name their first squad since Gareth Bale's retirement, as manager Rob Page heralds a new era by naming Aaron Ramsey as captain and picking FOUR uncapped players for their Euro 2024 qualifiers against Croatia and Latvia

Rob Page has selected a 24-man squad for opening Euro 2024 qualifiers against Croatia and Latvia, and the Wales manager is expected to announce his new skipper on Tuesday.

Aaron Ramsey insists there is 'more to come' from him at Nice after starring in the club's unbeaten 2023...but refuses to commit future to the club beyond his contract expiry this summer

Aaron Ramsey has insisted there is more to come from him in a Nice shirt but has remained tight-lipped about his future beyond the end of the season.

Middlesbrough confirm the signing of Aston Villa midfielder Aaron Ramsey on loan until the end of the season... with the 20-year-old joining Villans team-mate Cameron Archer at the Riverside

The 20-year-old, who has represented England at youth level, made his senior debut for Villa last season, but was sent out on loan to Norwich for the first part of the current campaign.

Welsh FA agrees landmark equal pay deal until 2027 which will see the women's national team paid the same as the men - with Rob Page's squad unanimously agreeing to take a pay cut to allow the move to happen

For the first time ever, Welsh men's and women's senior national players will be paid the same for representing their country. The landmark deal, lasting until 2027, covers a World Cup for men and women.

Aaron Ramsey HASN'T RETURNED to Nice - and hasn't even spoken to his manager - after Wales were knocked out of the World Cup almost a month ago and finding the experience 'hard to digest'

Ramsey was part of a Wales squad who were playing in the tournament for the first time since 1958 and were keen to at least advance from the group phase.

Bellingham, Amrabat and Gvardiol used the World Cup to enhance their reputations... but Ronaldo is unlikely to get many offers, while De Ligt and Tielemans disappointed: Tops and flops from Qatar

JOE BERNSTEIN: Some outstanding prospects have caught the eye of Premier League superpowers and other top clubs while others may have diminished their chances of a dream move.

IAN HERBERT: Why Wales NEED Gareth Bale to stick around for a few more years… the aura he and Aaron Ramsey create and the tone they set will help bring the new generation on

IAN HERBERT DEPUTY CHIEF SPORTS WRITER IN DOHA: Ramsey had not publicly discussed the World Cup once out here and Bale did so only to fulfil FIFA obligations.

'They are a waste of two jerseys': Wales fans insist it's time for Aaron Ramsey and Gareth Bale to retire after Rob Page was 'far too reliant' on the 'over the hill' pair in their dismal World Cup campaign

Wales fans took to social media after the game to thank Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey for their contribution to Wales over the years, but insist it was time for them to retire.

IAN HERBERT: Gary Speed's memory is fuelling belief amongst the Welsh players ahead of Tuesday's crucial World Cup clash against England... as Rob Page's side observe a minute's silence in training to honour the Wales legend

IAN HERBERT: Just before the sun set in Qatar on Sunday night, the Wales players formed a circle on their training pitch to observe a poignant minute's silence for Gary Speed.

'They'll be able to answer a few of those critics': Wales midfielder Joe Allen backs Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey to shine against England

Wales midfielder Joe Allen is confident Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey can rise to the occasion when they face England on Tuesday in hope of progressing in the World Cup.

JAMES COLLINS: Wales will need to have belief when they come up against England in their final World Cup group stage game... and they should play to Kieffer Moore's strengths against Three Lions

JAMES COLLINS: We lacked passion and quality. Tactically too, I'm not sure that we got it right. If Kieffer Moore is up front then you've got to play to his strengths. Go a bit more direct.

Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey are 'not match-fit' according to former Welsh international Hal Robson-Kanu... who defends the team and says they 'gave their all' despite costly World Cup defeat against Iran

Former Welsh international Hal Robson-Kanu has insisted that Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey are 'not match-fit'. The pair underwhelmed in Wales' 2-0 defeat to Iran.

Wales' Red Wall were like a 12th man in their draw with USA... there's something special about this team beyond their big name players

There's something special about Wales. Not just the players they have at their disposal in Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey, but the thousands of supporters that follow them through thick and thin.

Tears, but no fears! Wales are riding a wave of emotion on their first World Cup adventure for 64 years - despite concerns over star players Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey's lack of fitness as they head off to Qatar

IAN HERBERT: You only had to be in the Rhondda Valley community centre for an event marking the Wales squad announcement to appreciate how much what lies ahead actually means.

A dramatic play-off victory, a team built around success in north London and the then-most expensive British player of all time leading the line... It's been 64 years but what happened last time Wales reached the World Cup?

Gareth Bale, Aaron Ramsey and Joe Allen have spear-headed a side that has qualified for three of the last four major tournaments - a better record than powerhouses Italy and Holland.

PSG 2-1 Nice: Kylian Mbappe comes off the bench to hand PSG all three points against Nice after Lionel Messi had hit a trademark free-kick in win at the Parc des Princes

PSG were held to a 1-1 draw by Nice on Saturday evening, despite another wonder free-kick from Lionel Messi.

Favre is facing the sack amid poor results with a squad of Premier League cast-offs, while billionaire owner Ratcliffe wants United... Nice are a BASKET CASE and Pochettino may want to steer clear!

They always say you should 'never go back' in football. It's not the same second time around and Nice coach Lucien Favre is currently discovering that in painful fashion.

'All of a sudden the contract was no longer there': Aaron Ramsey reveals how he left Arsenal after new deal offer was mysteriously withdrawn... as Welsh star tries to get back on track at Nice after Juventus struggles

The Wales midfielder's contract was due to expire but Ramsey believed the club wanted him to stay. So it came as something of a shock when he was allowed to leave for Juventus on a free transfer

EUROPA CONFERENCE LEAGUE ROUND-UP: Fulham loanee Joe Bryan gets his first goal for Nice as they are held in Belgrade... but it proves a humbling night for Shamrock Rovers away to Gent

ROUND-UP: Kasper Schmeichel saw his clean sheet vanish on the hour mark when Fousseni Diabete, teed up by Bibars Natcho, broke Nice's resistance having gone ahead through Bryan.

Arsenal FLOP Nicolas Pepe looks set to join Nice on loan this summer after the Gunners' £72m club-record signing has fallen down the pecking order at the Emirates

The winger, 27, has struggled to make an impact at the Emirates since his £72million move from Lille in the summer of 2019.

Reunited! Arsene Wenger links up with his former Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey after visiting Nice's training ground as the ex-Gunners boss backs the Welshman to 'contribute' in Ligue 1 and 'get back to his best'

Aaron Ramsey had a chance to catch up with his former Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger this week, when the legendary manager visited training at Ramsey's new club Nice.

Aaron Ramsey reveals his French former team-mates at Arsenal played a key role in him joining Nice... after he made the perfect start to life in Ligue 1 by scoring just ONE minute into his debut

The Welsh midfielder had been without a club after leaving Serie A giants Juventus at the end of his contract. He scored just one minute into his debut in a 1-1 draw against Toulouse.

Aaron Ramsey scores a sensational debut goal for Nice just ONE MINUTE after coming on as a substitute in their Ligue 1 opener against Toulouse... as he bids to rebuild his career after Juventus struggles

The former Arsenal and Juventus midfielder was named on the substitutes bench for the French side, before being introduced in place of Calvin Stengs on 77 minutes. Just one minute later, he scored.

Aaron Ramsey is unveiled by Nice following his free transfer from Juventus - and he is set for a reunion with Arsene Wenger with the former Arsenal boss visiting Ligue 1 club next week

Former Arsenal captain Aaron Ramsey will join up with Gunners legendary boss Arsene Wenger after joining OGC Nice following the termination of his Juventus contract.

'Magic Chris' Waddle is a Marseille legend, Hoddle shone under Wenger at Monaco and Beckham charmed PSG in the last days of his career... Brits who've played in France as Ramsey joins Nice

While Welsh players have been thin on the ground, Aaron Ramsey joins an extensive list of British footballers who have plied their trade on the other side of the Channel after he signed for Nice.

Charlotte FC miss out on Aaron Ramsey with former Juventus, Arsenal and Rangers man set to join French club Nice after verbally agreeing move - with the Welsh midfielder keen for first-team action ahead of World Cup

The midfielder spent last season on loan with Rangers, where he started just five league matches and missed a crucial penalty in the Europa League final shootout vs. Frankfurt.

Aaron Ramsey joins French side Nice on a free transfer after leaving Juventus - with the Welsh midfielder keen for first-team football ahead of the World Cup this winter

Ramsey is without a club after settling the final year of his contract with Juventus last month. He is a key member of the Wales squad that qualified for the World Cup for the first time since 1958.

ALVISE CAGNAZZO: Juventus fans are ALREADY fearing that new signing Paul Pogba will be the heir to injury-prone Aaron Ramsey after his return to the club was hit with a major setback, with a knee issue keeping the Frenchman out for months

ALVISE CAGNAZZO IN ITALY: Juventus fans are fearful, saddened and left cursing their misfortune with the news of Paul Pogba's injury, with the French star picking up a serious-looking knock.

STEPHEN MCGOWAN: Celtic and Rangers are splashing the cash like drunken sailors and leaving the rest of the SPL all at sea... the Scottish top flight is seen as two leagues within one, 37 years on from the last champion outside Glasgow

It's now 37 years since a team from outside Glasgow were crowned champions of Scotland and there is now an acceptance that the Premiership is two leagues within one.

Aaron Ramsey is attracting interest from MLS after Juventus ripped up his contract... and the midfielder could follow in the footsteps of his countryman Gareth Bale to become the face of a franchise in the US

Juventus confirmed that they have terminated Ramsey's contract after a turbulent three years in Turin on Wednesday and his s newfound status as a free agent has attracted interest from MLS clubs.

BREAKING NEWS: Aaron Ramsey's £400,000-a-week contract is RIPPED UP by Juventus as he walks away from Turin after an awful three years... with Monza, the MLS and a move to Turkey all potential options for the Welsh star

Juventus have confirmed that they have terminated the contract of Aaron Ramsey after a turbulent three years in Turin. The Welsh international midfielder was recently on loan at Rangers.

Paul Pogba suffers a torn meniscus in his right knee during Juventus' pre-season training... with the Frenchman set to see a specialist to determine whether or not surgery is required in an early blow to his Italian return

Pogba limped off the training field in Los Angeles and as a result the former Manchester United star will not travel with the Italian side to Dallas as they continue their pre-season tour.

Juventus see PSG's Leandro Paredes as the final piece of their summer transfer business and want him to line up with Paul Pogba and Manuel Locatelli in midfield next season... but they'll have to double their initial £13m offer to get him

ALVISE CAGNAZZO IN ITALY: Juventus are looking to fix their midfield for next season. Max Allegri is likely to loan out 20-year-old Nicolo Rovella following a loan offer from Salernitana.

Join forces with Silvio Berlusconi's Monza ahead of their maiden season in Serie A, follow Gareth Bale to MLS... or reunite with Andrea Pirlo in Turkey? What next for Aaron Ramsey as he prepares to walk away from £400,000-a-week deal at Juventus

ALVISE CAGNAZZO IN ITALY: So keen is he to leave, Ramsey is prepared to walk away from his £400,000-a-week deal to ensure he can play regular football with the World Cup in Qatar four months away.

Juventus' midfield clear-out! Italian giants are desperate to sell unwanted trio Aaron Ramsey, Adrien Rabiot and Arthur this summer... with the Italian giants expected to save £18m-a-year in wages if they move on

Juventus plan to sell Aaron Ramsey, Adrien Rabiot and Arthur Melo ahead of next season after leaving the trio out of their pre-season tour of America. The trio are no longer part of the club's plans.

They're not done yet! Nottingham Forest 'will sign ANOTHER big name ahead of their Premier League return' after bringing in 11 stars - including £120,000-a-week Jesse Lingard... as fans claim it could be Juve outcast Aaron Ramsey

The newly promoted Premier League side have been the most active side in the top flight this summer with Manchester United's Jesse Lingard becoming their 11th signing of the window.

Aaron Ramsey asks Juventus to settle the final year of his deal in a bid to move elsewhere for free as the Wales star prepares to walk away from his £400,000-a-week contract in Turin

Aaron Ramsey is in talks with Juventus to settle the final year of his contract and allow him to sign for another club for free. The Wales star is prepared to walk away from the Serie A club.

Aaron Ramsey accidentally signs fan-made 'contract termination' document following trick from Juventus supporter... with ex-Arsenal midfielder unlikely to be in Serie A giants' plans after return from Rangers loan spell

Ramsey took the time to sign autographs for Juventus fans but he was caught out by one supporter, who had devised his own 'contract termination' document.

Footballer Aaron Ramsey goes shirtless in blue board shorts as he enjoys a boat trip with his wife Colleen and their three sons in Ibiza

Aaron Ramsey enjoyed a fun-filled boat trip with Colleen and their three sons - Sonny, seven, and twins Tomas and Teddy, three - in Ibiza on Monday.

Footballer Aaron Ramsey looks relaxed as he holidays in Ibiza with stunning bikini-clad wife Colleen and their three sons

Rangers and Juventus star Aaron Ramsey looked relaxed as he holidayed wife Colleen and their three sons in Ibiza this week.

Aaron Ramsey 'could be reunited with former Juventus boss Andrea Pirlo this summer at Turkish top-flight side Fatih Karagumruk' following underwhelming loan spell at Rangers

Aaron Ramsey has reportedly been linked with a surprise move to Turkey this summer, but only if Juventus allow the midfielder to depart on a free transfer.

STEPHEN McGOWAN: Never mind the penalty miss... the signing of Aaron Ramsey has failed to hit the mark. He was hailed as the biggest Rangers signing since Gazza but may be one of their most expensive mistakes

STEPHEN McGOWAN IN SEVILLE: When Aaron Ramsey signed for Rangers on loan in January, he was branded the biggest signing since Gazza. It's an opinion that hasn't aged well.
